movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

poster.caption: Brad Pitt, Til Schweiger, Daniel Brühl, Mélanie Laurent, Eli Roth, Christoph Waltz, and Diane Kruger in Inglourious Basterds (2009)

movies.title: Avatar
movies.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

poster.caption: Zoe Saldaña and Sam Worthington in Avatar (2009)

movies.title: Up
movies.plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to South America in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

poster.caption: Edward Asner, Bob Peterson, and Jordan Nagai in Up (2009)

movies.title: The Hangover
movies.plot: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They must make their way around the city in order to find their friend in time for his wedding.

poster.caption: Bradley Cooper, Zach Galifianakis, and Ed Helms in The Hangover (2009)

movies.title: District 9
movies.plot: In a future Earth in which aliens are isolated in a remote ghetto, a government agent finds himself banished there.

poster.caption: District 9 (2009)

movies.title: Sherlock Holmes
movies.plot: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

poster.caption: Jude Law, Robert Downey Jr., Mark Strong, and Rachel McAdams in Sherlock Holmes (2009)

movies.title: Zombieland
movies.plot: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.

poster.caption: Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Abigail Breslin, and Emma Stone in Zombieland (2009)

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
movies.originalTitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
movies.plot: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

poster.caption: Michael Gambon, Rupert Grint, Daniel Radcliffe, and Emma Watson in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (2009)

movies.title: Star Trek
movies.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

poster.caption: Star Trek (2009)

movies.title: 500 Days of Summer
movies.plot: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

poster.caption: Zooey Deschanel and Joseph Gordon-Levitt in 500 Days of Summer (2009)

movies.title: Watchmen
movies.plot: In a version of 1985 where superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach on the trail of a conspiracy that will change the course of history.

poster.caption: Billy Crudup, Malin Akerman, Matthew Goode, Jackie Earle Haley, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, and Patrick Wilson in Watchmen (2009)

movies.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
movies.plot: The early years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

poster.caption: Hugh Jackman in X-Men Origins: Wolverine (2009)

movies.title: 3 Idiots
movies.plot: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

poster.caption: Sharman Joshi, Aamir Khan, and Madhavan in 3 Idiots (2009)

movies.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
movies.plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

poster.caption: Peter Cullen, Shia LaBeouf, and Megan Fox in Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen (2009)

movies.plot: A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

poster.caption: Osric Chau in 2012 (2009)

movies.title: The Proposal
movies.plot: When New York editor Margaret faces deportation, she convinces her assistant Andrew to marry her in return for a promotion. However, when she visits his hometown, it changes her in many ways.

poster.caption: Sandra Bullock and Ryan Reynolds in The Proposal (2009)

movies.title: Moon
movies.plot: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth, parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our plane

poster.caption: Sam Rockwell in Moon (2009)

movies.title: Terminator Salvation
movies.plot: As the machines prepare for a final attack, John Connor and a mysterious stranger delve into the heart of Skynet and uncover a terrible secret involving the annihilation of mankind.

poster.caption: Terminator Salvation (2009)

movies.title: The Blind Side
movies.plot: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

poster.caption: Sandra Bullock and Quinton Aaron in The Blind Side (2009)

movies.title: Up in the Air
movies.plot: Ryan's job is to travel around the country, firing people. When his boss hires Natalie, who proposes firing people via video conference, he tries to convince her that her method is a mistake.

poster.caption: George Clooney, Vera Farmiga, and Anna Kendrick in Up in the Air (2009)

movies.title: Law Abiding Citizen
movies.plot: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.

poster.caption: Jamie Foxx and Gerard Butler in Law Abiding Citizen (2009)

movies.title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
movies.plot: Professor Wilson discovers a lost Akita puppy on his way home. Despite objections from his wife, Hachi endears himself to the family and grows to be Parker's loyal companion. As their bond grows deeper, a beautiful relationship unfolds.

poster.caption: Richard Gere in Hachi: A Dog's Tale (2009)

movies.title: Public Enemies
movies.plot: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson, and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

poster.caption: Johnny Depp in Public Enemies (2009)

movies.title: Fast & Furious
movies.plot: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

poster.caption: Vin Diesel, Jordana Brewster, Michelle Rodriguez, and Paul Walker in Fast & Furious (2009)

movies.title: Angels & Demons
movies.plot: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.

poster.caption: Tom Hanks in Angels & Demons (2009)

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
movies.plot: After Edward leaves because of an incident involving Bella, Jacob Black becomes her best friend, but what Bella doesn't realize is that Jacob also has a secret that will suddenly change their lives.

poster.caption: Kristen Stewart, Taylor Lautner, and Robert Pattinson in The Twilight Saga: New Moon (2009)

movies.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
movies.plot: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

poster.caption: George Clooney, Bill Murray, Meryl Streep, Jason Schwartzman, Owen Wilson, Eric Chase Anderson, and Wallace Wolodarsky in Fantastic Mr. Fox (2009)

movies.title: Coraline
movies.plot: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, a young girl discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life that seems too good to be true.

poster.caption: Teri Hatcher, Keith David, Dakota Fanning, Dawn French, Ian McShane, Jennifer Saunders, Christopher Murrie-Green, and Harry Selick in Coraline (2009)

movies.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
movies.originalTitle: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
movies.plot: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

poster.caption: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs (2009)

movies.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
movies.originalTitle: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
movies.plot: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

poster.caption: Neil Patrick Harris, Anna Faris, Bill Hader, and Jeremy Shada in Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (2009)

movies.title: Orphan
movies.plot: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she appears.

poster.caption: Isabelle Fuhrman in Orphan (2009)

movies.title: The Road
movies.plot: In a dangerous post-apocalyptic world, an ailing father defends his son as they slowly travel to the sea.

poster.caption: Viggo Mortensen and Kodi Smit-McPhee in The Road (2009)

movies.title: Knowing
movies.plot: M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.

poster.caption: Knowing (2009)

movies.title: Mr. Nobody
movies.plot: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

poster.caption: Jared Leto in Mr. Nobody (2009)

movies.title: The Ugly Truth
movies.plot: An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.

poster.caption: Katherine Heigl and Gerard Butler in The Ugly Truth (2009)

movies.title: The Secret in Their Eyes
movies.plot: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior--both of which still haunt him decades later.

poster.caption: Ricardo Darín and Soledad Villamil in The Secret in Their Eyes (2009)

movies.title: 17 Again
movies.plot: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

poster.caption: Zac Efron in 17 Again (2009)

movies.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
movies.plot: Influential industrialist Vanger's niece Harriet disappeared under mysterious circumstances 40 years ago. As a last attempt at solving the case, he hires investigative journalist Mikael Blomkvist.

poster.caption: Noomi Rapace in The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009)

movies.title: Drag Me to Hell
movies.plot: An ambitious loan officer must find a way to shatter a curse that threatens her soul with damnation.

poster.caption: Alison Lohman in Drag Me to Hell (2009)

movies.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
movies.originalTitle: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
movies.plot: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

poster.caption: Robin Williams, Hank Azaria, Christopher Guest, Ben Stiller, Brad Garrett, Owen Wilson, Amy Adams, Alain Chabat, Steve Coogan, Patrick Gallagher, Bill Hader, Mizuo Peck, Jon Bernthal, and Crystal the Monkey in Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian (2009)

movies.title: I Love You, Man
movies.plot: Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But, when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?

poster.caption: Paul Rudd and Jason Segel in I Love You, Man (2009)

movies.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
movies.originalTitle: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
movies.plot: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

poster.caption: Christopher Eccleston, Marlon Wayans, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Lee Byung-hun, Rachel Nichols, Ray Park, Sienna Miller, and Channing Tatum in G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra (2009)

movies.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
movies.plot: Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.

poster.caption: John Travolta and Denzel Washington in The Taking of Pelham 123 (2009)

movies.title: Mary and Max
movies.plot: In 1976 Melbourne, a lonely 8-year-old girl strikes up a correspondence with an unlikely pen pal: a severely obese 44-year-old New Yorker with Asperger's syndrome.

poster.caption: Mary and Max (2009)

movies.title: He's Just Not That Into You
movies.originalTitle: He's Just Not That Into You
movies.plot: This Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.

poster.caption: Jennifer Aniston, Drew Barrymore, Jennifer Connelly, Ben Affleck, Kevin Connolly, Bradley Cooper, Ginnifer Goodwin, Scarlett Johansson, and Justin Long in He's Just Not That Into You (2009)

movies.title: The Lovely Bones
movies.plot: Centers on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from purgatory. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

poster.caption: Stanley Tucci and Saoirse Ronan in The Lovely Bones (2009)

movies.title: Monsters vs. Aliens
movies.plot: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

poster.caption: Reese Witherspoon, Will Arnett, Hugh Laurie, and Seth Rogen in Monsters vs. Aliens (2009)

movies.title: The Princess and the Frog
movies.plot: A waitress desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

poster.caption: John Goodman, Oprah Winfrey, Bruno Campos, Terrence Howard, Jim Cummings, Keith David, Jenifer Lewis, Ritchie Montgomery, Anika Noni Rose, Michael-Leon Wooley, Paul Briggs, Jennifer Cody, and Don Hall in The Princess and the Frog (2009)

movies.title: Surrogates
movies.plot: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.

poster.caption: Bruce Willis in Surrogates (2009)

movies.title: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
movies.plot: A prequel centered on the origins of the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their former slaves, the Lycans.

poster.caption: Rhona Mitra in Underworld: Rise of the Lycans (2009)
